name: create-request
description: A modern, chainable wrapper for fetch with automatic retries, timeouts, comprehensive error handling, and first-class TypeScript support

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run check && npm run build
scripts.publish:beta: npm run check && npm version prerelease --preid=beta && git push origin --tags && npm publish --tag latest
scripts.disabled:publish:patch: npm version patch && git push origin --tags && npm publish
scripts.disabled:publish:minor: npm version minor && git push origin --tags && npm publish
scripts.disabled:publish:major: npm version major && git push origin --tags && npm publish
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run test

author: Daniel Amenou <amenou.daniel@gmail.com>
